A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It started looking like the same old story of the apprentice
looking for the master\, but then Rian Johnson  starts a grass fire and\, as it finds fuel\, everything starts to burn. 

Good\, it needed to happen. In 3 minutes the mydochlorian  bs is refuted. Like shows the flaws in the understanding of the Jedi religion and here in the real world the crap writing in the prequels suddenly gains a purpose. 

Complete with Jungian/Campbell archetypes and symbolism. Rian Johnson destroyed Star Wars and rebuilt it from the ashes.
